Let<S>3049</S> a man<S>444</S> so<S>3779</S> account<S>3049</S> of us<S>2248</S>, as<S>5613</S> of the ministers<S>5257</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> stewards<S>3623</S> of the mysteries<S>3466</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
<S>3739</S> <S>1161</S> Moreover<S>3063</S> it is required<S>2212</S> in<S>1722</S> stewards<S>3623</S>, that<S>2443</S> a man<S>5100</S> be found<S>2147</S> faithful<S>4103</S>.
But<S>1161</S> with me<S>1698</S> it is<S>2076</S> a very small thing<S>1519</S> <S>1646</S> that<S>2443</S> I should be judged<S>350</S> of<S>5259</S> you<S>5216</S>, or<S>2228</S> of<S>5259</S> man's<S>442</S> judgment<S>2250</S>: yea<S>235</S>, I judge<S>350</S> not<S>3761</S> mine own self<S>1683</S>. <sup>judgment: Gr. day</sup>
For<S>1063</S> I know<S>4894</S> nothing<S>3762</S> by myself<S>1683</S>; yet<S>235</S> am I<S>1344</S> not<S>3756</S> hereby<S>1722</S> <S>5129</S> justified<S>1344</S>: but<S>1161</S> he that judgeth<S>350</S> me<S>3165</S> is<S>2076</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>. <sup>know: or, I am not conscious of any fault</sup>
Therefore<S>5620</S> judge<S>2919</S> nothing<S>3361</S> <S>5100</S> before<S>4253</S> the time<S>2540</S>, until<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> come<S>2064</S>, who<S>3739</S> both<S>2532</S> will bring to light<S>5461</S> the hidden things<S>2927</S> of darkness<S>4655</S>, and<S>2532</S> will make manifest<S>5319</S> the counsels<S>1012</S> of the hearts<S>2588</S>: and<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall every man<S>1538</S> have<S>1096</S> praise<S>1868</S> of<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>1161</S> these things<S>5023</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, I have in a figure transferred<S>3345</S> to<S>1519</S> myself<S>1683</S> and<S>2532</S> to Apollos<S>625</S> for<S>1223</S> your sakes<S>5209</S>; that<S>2443</S> ye might learn<S>3129</S> in<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S> not<S>3361</S> to think<S>5426</S> of men above<S>5228</S> that<S>2443</S> which<S>3739</S> is written<S>1125</S>, that no<S>3363</S> one<S>1520</S> of you be puffed up<S>5448</S> for<S>5228</S> one<S>1520</S> against<S>2596</S> another<S>2087</S>.
For<S>1063</S> who<S>5101</S> maketh<S>1252</S> thee<S>4571</S> to differ<S>1252</S> from another? and<S>1161</S> what<S>5101</S> hast thou<S>2192</S> that<S>3739</S> thou didst<S>2983</S> not<S>3756</S> receive<S>2983</S>?<S>1161</S> now if<S>1499</S> thou didst receive<S>2983</S> it, why<S>5101</S> dost thou glory<S>2744</S>, as<S>5613</S> if thou hadst<S>2983</S> not<S>3361</S> received<S>2983</S> it? <sup>maketh: Gr. distinguisheth thee</sup>
Now<S>2235</S> ye are<S>2075</S> full<S>2880</S>, now<S>2235</S> ye are rich<S>4147</S>, ye have reigned as kings<S>936</S> without<S>5565</S> us<S>2257</S>: and<S>2532</S> I would to God<S>3785</S> <S>1065</S> ye did reign<S>936</S>, that<S>2443</S> we<S>2249</S> also<S>2532</S> might reign with<S>4821</S> you<S>5213</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I think<S>1380</S> that<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> hath set forth<S>584</S> us<S>2248</S> the apostles<S>652</S> last<S>2078</S>, as<S>5613</S> it were appointed to death<S>1935</S>: for<S>3754</S> we are made<S>1096</S> a spectacle<S>2302</S> unto the world<S>2889</S>, and<S>2532</S> to angels<S>32</S>, and<S>2532</S> to men<S>444</S>. <sup>spectacle: Gr. theatre</sup>
We<S>2249</S> are fools<S>3474</S> for<S>1223</S> Christ's<S>5547</S> sake<S>1223</S>, but<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> are wise<S>5429</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S>; we<S>2249</S> are weak<S>772</S>, but<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> are strong<S>2478</S>; ye<S>5210</S> are honourable<S>1741</S>, but<S>1161</S> we<S>2249</S> are despised<S>820</S>.
Even<S>891</S> unto this present<S>737</S> hour<S>5610</S> we<S>3983</S> both<S>2532</S> hunger<S>3983</S>, and<S>2532</S> thirst<S>1372</S>, and<S>2532</S> are naked<S>1130</S>, and<S>2532</S> are buffeted<S>2852</S>, and<S>2532</S> have no certain dwellingplace<S>790</S>;
And<S>2532</S> labour<S>2872</S>, working<S>2038</S> with our own<S>2398</S> hands<S>5495</S>: being reviled<S>3058</S>, we bless<S>2127</S>; being persecuted<S>1377</S>, we suffer it<S>430</S>:
Being defamed<S>987</S>, we intreat<S>3870</S>: we are made<S>1096</S> as<S>5613</S> the filth<S>4027</S> of the world<S>2889</S>, and are the offscouring<S>4067</S> of all things<S>3956</S> unto<S>2193</S> this day<S>737</S>.
I write<S>1125</S> not<S>3756</S> these things<S>5023</S> to shame<S>1788</S> you<S>5209</S>, but<S>235</S> as<S>5613</S> my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S> sons<S>5043</S> I warn<S>3560</S> you.
For<S>1063</S> though<S>1437</S> ye have<S>2192</S> ten thousand<S>3463</S> instructors<S>3807</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, yet<S>235</S> have ye not<S>3756</S> many<S>4183</S> fathers<S>3962</S>: for<S>1063</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> I<S>1473</S> have begotten<S>1080</S> you<S>5209</S> through<S>1223</S> the gospel<S>2098</S>.
Wherefore<S>3767</S> I beseech<S>3870</S> you<S>5209</S>, be ye<S>1096</S> followers<S>3402</S> of me<S>3450</S>.
For<S>1223</S> this<S>5124</S> cause<S>1223</S> have I sent<S>3992</S> unto you<S>5213</S> Timotheus<S>5095</S>, who<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S> son<S>5043</S>, and<S>2532</S> faithful<S>4103</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, who<S>3739</S> shall bring<S>363</S> you<S>5209</S> into remembrance<S>363</S> of my<S>3450</S> ways<S>3598</S> which<S>3588</S> be in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, as<S>2531</S> I teach<S>1321</S> every where<S>3837</S> in<S>1722</S> every<S>3956</S> church<S>1577</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> some<S>5100</S> are puffed up<S>5448</S>, as though<S>5613</S> I<S>3450</S> would<S>2064</S> not<S>3361</S> come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I will come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> shortly<S>5030</S>, if<S>1437</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> will<S>2309</S>, and<S>2532</S> will know<S>1097</S>, not<S>3756</S> the speech<S>3056</S> of them which are puffed up<S>5448</S>, but<S>235</S> the power<S>1411</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S> is not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> word<S>3056</S>, but<S>235</S> in<S>1722</S> power<S>1411</S>.
What<S>5101</S> will ye<S>2309</S>? shall I come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> with<S>1722</S> a rod<S>4464</S>, or<S>2228</S> in<S>1722</S> love<S>26</S>, and<S>5037</S> in the spirit<S>4151</S> of meekness<S>4236</S>?
